name: stGeorges
appraisal: { "changed": true, "reason": "Per the Sunday Newsletter, Saturday evening Confessions are from 5.00–5.50pm, not until 6.00pm. Weekday (12.00–12.20pm) and Sunday (10.00–10.30am and 12.00–12.30pm) times remain as stated." }

name: stPatricks
appraisal: { "changed": true, "reason": "According to this newsletter, Confession is Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm and on Saturday from 5:30pm to 5:55pm. There is no Confession time listed for Sundays. Your stated times of 12:00–12:40 on weekdays and 5:30–6:00pm on Saturdays do not match the published schedule." }

name: our_lady_of_mount_carmel_and_st_simon_stock
appraisal: { "changed": true, "reason": "Please note that Saturday evening confessions conclude at 5:50 p.m., not 6:00 p.m., as stated in the newsletter. All other times remain as published: Mon–Fri 5:40 p.m.–6:00 p.m., Saturday morning 11:30 a.m.–12:15 p.m., and no Sunday confessions." }
